author: Matthew Impelli
title: Viral Video Shows Atlanta Residents Applauding Healthcare Workers From Their Apartments During Shift Change
description: A new viral video shows people in Atlanta cheering and applauding healthcare workers from their apartment buildings for healthcare workers as they change shifts.
content:
The video comes amid a time where doctors, nurses and other health care workers have been revered by citizens across the world for their hard work in fighting on the front lines of the coronavirus pandemic.
